Program_AdminRequired_Text:
This installer requires administrator privileges.

Please right-click and select 'Run as administrator'.
Program_MtgaRunning_Text:
Please close Magic: The Gathering Arena first.

The installer cannot modify files while the game is running.
Program_UninstallError_Text:
Could not determine MTGA installation path.

Please run the installer normally to reinstall.
Program_Welcome_Text:
Welcome to Accessible Arena!

This will install the accessibility mod for playing Magic: The Gathering Arena on your computer.
Welcome_Description:
This will install the accessibility mod for Magic: The Gathering Arena.

The mod enables blind and visually impaired players to play MTGA using the NVDA screen reader.

If you don't have MTGA installed yet, please download and install it first.
Main_StatusInstall:
This will install the accessibility mod for Magic: The Gathering Arena.
The mod enables blind players to play using NVDA screen reader.
Main_StatusUpdate: This will update the accessibility mod to the latest version.
Main_PathNotFound:
MTGA.exe not found in the selected folder.
Please select the correct MTGA installation folder.
Main_MelonRequired_Text:
MelonLoader is required but not installed.

MelonLoader is a mod loader that allows the accessibility mod to work.

Do you want to download and install MelonLoader now?
Main_MelonSkipped_Text:
MelonLoader is required for the accessibility mod to work.

The installer will continue, but the mod will not function until MelonLoader is installed.

You can install MelonLoader manually from:
https://github.com/LavaGang/MelonLoader/releases
Main_MelonFound_Text:
MelonLoader is already installed.

Do you want to reinstall MelonLoader?

Click 'Yes' to reinstall, or 'No' to continue with the existing installation.
Main_VersionCheckFailed_Text:
Could not check for the latest mod version.

This may be because:
- No internet connection
- GitHub repository not found
- No releases published yet

Do you want to try downloading the mod anyway?
Main_ModDownloadFailed_Format:
Could not download the mod: {0}

The installer will continue, but you will need to install the mod manually.

Download from: {1}/releases
Copy {2} to the Mods folder.
Main_CompleteFirstLaunch:
IMPORTANT: The first time you launch MTGA after installing MelonLoader,
the game will take longer to start (1-2 minutes) while MelonLoader
generates necessary files. This is normal and only happens once.
Main_CompleteModInstalled: The accessibility mod has been installed successfully.
Main_CompleteModUpdated: The accessibility mod has been updated successfully.
Main_CompleteModNotInstalled_Format:
Note: The mod DLL was not installed.
Please download it manually from:
{0}/releases
Uninstall_Description: This will remove the Accessible Arena from your system.
Uninstall_MelonLoaderCheckBox: Also remove MelonLoader (only if you don't use other mods)
Uninstall_Confirm_Text:
Are you sure you want to uninstall the Accessible Arena?

This will remove:
- AccessibleArena.dll from Mods folder
- Tolk screen reader libraries
- Registry entries
Logger_SaveLog_Errors:
There were some warnings or errors during installation.

Would you like to save a log file to your Desktop for troubleshooting?
Logger_SaveLog_Normal: Would you like to save a log file to your Desktop?
